[faastjs](./faastjs.md) &gt; [AwsOptions](./faastjs.awsoptions.md) &gt; [awsConfig](./faastjs.awsoptions.awsconfig.md)

## AwsOptions.awsConfig property

Additional options to pass to all AWS services. See [AWS.Config](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSJavaScriptSDK/latest/AWS/Config.html)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
awsConfig?: ConfigurationOptions;
```

## Remarks

If you need to specify AWS options such as credentials, you can pass set these options here. Note that faast.js will override some options even if they are specified here, specifically the options used to create the `Lambda` service, to ensure they allow for faast to function correctly. Options set in [CommonOptions](./faastjs.commonoptions.md) override those set here.

Example of passing in credentials:

```typescript
  const credentials = { accessKeyId, secretAccessKey };
  const m = await faastAws(funcs, { credentials });
```
